posts.name: Mentor
posts.cooked: Can anyone here attest to the quality of Nitra pneumatic cylinders, sold by Automation Direct?

posts.name: sanddrag
posts.cooked: I find them comparable to anything else. No issues to report.

posts.name: Brian Wagg
posts.cooked: My go to supplier for pneumatic cylinders. Always seemed to be good quality, and very fair pricing. Not to mention the fast order turnaround/shipping (note I’m in Canada, I’d imagine US shipping is even snappier).

posts.name: Stewart Riley
posts.cooked: Very good cylinders. We also use Automation Direct for our pneumatic equipment and are very happy with them. Right now they are actually shipping to US addresses for free and with a guaranteed two day delivery. They just sent us two cylinders by FedEx overnight for free (the shipping, not the cylinders) so they could keep their two day delivery promise. That’s the kind of service that makes my old mentor heart happy.

posts.name: Eli Barnett
posts.cooked: I’ll endorse AutomationDirect for pneumatics, as well.  Prompt delivery and good prices.

user_custom_fields.user_field_4: Robot apartments! invisible suburbs! skeleton treasuries!

posts.custom_user_title: Robot apartments! invisible suburbs! skeleton treasuries!

posts.name: Mentor
posts.cooked: Thanks everybody. You’ve given us confidence to order the Nitra cylinders!

posts.name: system
